nodes.text: A Nimbanel had a bounty placed on its head by the Black Sun criminal syndicate by the time of the Galactic Civil War. The Ubese bounty hunter Boushh captured the Nimbanel in 3 ABY but then tried to ransom more money out of his contractor than initially agreed upon, claiming that capturing the Nimbanel had required more of his resources than usual. Black Sun Underlord Xizor responded by dispatching his personal lieutenant, Guri, to kill Boushh and bring in the Nimbanel herself.
